name.en: Gaia Blaze, the Force of Blazing Sun
name.ja: <ruby>烈<rt>れつ</rt></ruby><ruby>日<rt>じつ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>ガイアブレイズ

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can activate this effect; this card can make a second attack in a row. At the end of the Battle Phase: You can target FIRE monsters in your GY, up to the number of monsters this card destroyed by battle this turn; add them to your hand.
